text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/programs/configure.html 

Lists under "Modules enabled by default" section:

--disable-auth
    Disable user-based access control provided by mod_auth (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_auth.html). This module provides for HTTP Basic Authentication, where the usernames and passwords are stored in plain text files.


The "--disable-auth" parameter does not exist in Apache 2.2.9 and the linked url (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_auth.html) does not exist either.

Correct parameter would be:
--disable-auth_basic (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_auth_basic.html)
creator: johns400@yahoo.com
